title: "Assignments and grading"

Your final course grade will be calculated as follows:

| Category       | Percentage |
|----------------|------------|
| Problem Sets   | ??%        |
| Midterm Exam   | ??%        |
| Final exam     | ??%        |

Your final letter grade will be determined based on the usual thresholds, which will never move upward but may move downward in your favor:

| Letter Grade | Final Course Grade |
|--------------|--------------------|
| A+           | \>= 97             |
| A            | 93 - 96.99         |
| A-           | 90 - 92.99         |
| B+           | 87 - 89.99         |
| B            | 83 - 86.99         |
| B-           | 80 - 82.99         |
| C+           | 77 - 79.99         |
| C            | 73 - 76.99         |
| C-           | 70 - 72.99         |
| D+           | 67 - 69.99         |
| D            | 63 - 66.99         |
| D-           | 60 - 62.99         |
| F            | \< 60              |
